ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... wouldn t ... priority, something ... that s ... problem. If it happened to me?  Either they d fix it or I d be done with EQ.  That s what customer service
ygData.messageBody:
>they may be incredibly rare, but what if it happened to you? i bet you
wouldn't
>have it so far down on the priority list then. what is the higher
priority, something
>people have already learned to work around or something which can wipe out
>hundreds of hours of playtime on a character?
>you know well over 100 players, eh? out of the 200000 subscribers. yeah,
that's
>an appropriate sample size to determine that poofed corpses are just not a
problem.

If it happened to me? Either they'd fix it or I'd be done with EQ. That's
what customer service is about. No it still wouldn't be a higher priority.

I was only counting the people I know in RL personally. I doubt anyone
knows an appropriate sample size in that way. From seeing the boards
though, there are hundreds of posts on bard song bugs, very few on having
one's own corpse poof.

Kit
